title: Opsmap
dashboardCredits: The OPSMAP dashboard is an opensource solution under the MIT license
ochaCredits: The Humanitarian font pictograms are licensed under the CC BY 3.0

footer.moreInfosText:
OPSMAP aims at providing humanitarian actors essential information on services at site level to improve humanitarian assistance in IDP sites.
Information is collected through key informants at each IDP site using mobile data collection tool based or on using traditional format of survey.
The dashboard permit to quickly gain insights into collected data, by providing a site profile.
Users can get insights, and use them identify items that require urgent action, and properly purposing resources.
